script: There is a Retail Area in the center of my hometown.
About 2 km West of the Retail Area there is a Hospital
About 3 km North of the Hospital there is a Library
Playground is a location in my home town, it is 4 KM, North from Library.
I visited Park, which is 4 KM, North from Playground.
And finally there is High Street which is North from Park and 2 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Retail Area to High Street following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Retail Area, go 2km West to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 3km North to Library.
From Library, go 4km North to Playground.
From Playground, go 4km North to Park.
From Park, go 2km North to High Street.
